name: E's Laf ++
description: E's Laf++ (E's Laf 2) is the sequel to the original E's Laf fighting game. The graphics have been upgraded to an illustration style by turning 3D models into animated sprites. Returning characters have been reworked from the ground up, and the new mechanics give players freedom and expression to create their own unique style. Inspiration from the Guilty Gear series can be seen with examples like Fatal Shift (Roman Cancel), Risk Gauge (Negative Penalty), and let's not forget air dashes!
